name: monochromatic
content:
Add to word list

using only black, white, and grey, or using only one colour: He is noted for his monochromatic paintings in oils and pastels. His paintings, generally done with acrylic on canvas, are largely monochromatic.
physics
  specialized (of light) having a single wavelength (= distance between two waves of energy) or frequency (= number of times that a wave of light is produced within a particular period): Basically, laser light is monochromatic light. The purpose of this project was to utilize monochromatic X-rays in order to obtain noninvasive medical imaging. See
monochrome
